Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: 11,880 SF office space on two floors

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: One mile to I-495, 6.5 miles to Route 24, 9.5 miles to Route 44, 9.5 miles to I-95 and 20 miles toI-93

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: For Sale/Lease - Flex Manufacturing High-Bay Warehouse Opportunity

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Contiguous to 80,810 SF with 6 tailboard docks

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: High-Bay Industrial Space at 480 McClellan Highway, Boston

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE is pleased to bring to your attention the availability of multiple office
suites at two different McClellan Highway properties. 440 McClellan Highway
and 480 McClellan Highway are located within minutes to Boston Logan
International Airport. These office suites are the ideal location for any airport
related user looking to have quick and easy access to one of the nation’s
busiest airports.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
The center is located on heavily traveled Route 1, directly across from Home Depot and in close proximity to
Interstate 95 and Route 114. This ±10,857 SF space is available for sublease immediately with a flexible term through August 2024 and has the option to come fully furnished.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 75 Newbury Street is a ±28,861 SF retail/office center ideally located in one of Massachusetts strongest regional retail markets.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: High-Visibility Flex/Retail Space at 75 Newbury Street, Danvers

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located along Route 138, Canton Commerce Center is directly accessible from the Exit 2 interchange with I-93, providing access to downtown Boston, and is just one exit from the I-93/I-95 intersection. 20 Dan Road is 5.5 miles from Route 24, providing access to southern Massachusetts and Newport, RI, and is 1.5 miles from the Canton Center MBTA station.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE is pleased to present an exciting leasing opportunity at 20 Dan Road in Canton, Massachusetts. The Building is located within Canton Commerce Center, which is one of Route 128 South’s largest industrial parks. The Park totals over two million square feet of office, industrial and flex space and provides tenants with an attractive, corporate setting. The Building benefits from the adjacent Route 138 commercial corridor, which provides tenants with a plethora of amenities including retail, restaurant, and day care facilities.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Office/R&D/Flex Space Available at 20 Dan Road, Canton

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Convenient access to major highways, downtown Boston and the Cambridge/life science hub
4 miles from Boston Logan International Airport
Close proximity to new Somerville Green Line extension

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Stand-alone Urban Industrial/Flex Opportunity at 30 Cobble Hill Road

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: On behalf of our client, we are pleased to present the opportunity to sublease ±53,138 SF at 15-21 University Road. The building is a 105,000 SF highly functional flex/warehouse located just 30 minutes south of Boston in Canton, Massachusetts. There are two contiguous available suites to this building, with the option to sublease one or both.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The building is in a prime location with plenty of amenities nearby, plus in proximity to public transportation, Interstates 93 and 95.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: On behalf of our client, we are pleased to present the opportunity to sublease ±23,876-53,138 SF at 15-21 University Road. The building is a 105,000 SF highly functional flex/warehouse located just 30 minutes south of Boston in Canton, Massachusetts. There are two contiguous suites available at the building, with the option to sublease one or both.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
200 Foxborough offers the following amenities within walking distance:
•	Mansfield Commuter Rail
•	Starbucks
•	Fit Factory Health Club
•	Hampton Inn and Suites
•	Sonesta Select Boston Foxborough
•	Residence Inn by Marriott
•	Five restaurants

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: On behalf of Calare Properties, CBRE is pleased to present an opportunity to lease up to ±41,173 SF of high-end flex/R&D space at 200 Foxborough Boulevard, Foxborough, Massachusetts. Located at the Interstate 95/Route 140 Interchange in Foxborough, 200 Foxborough provides excellent on/off highway access, and tenants will enjoy an easy commute from any locale in the Greater Boston, Providence and Worcester areas.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Up to 41,173 SF Space Available at 200 Foxborough Boulevard, Foxborough

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text:
• Total Building: 55,302 SF
• Lab/R&D: 36,159 SF
• Office: 16,308 SF

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The building is conveniently located off Route 114 near the Route 125 interchange, and is approximately 2.5 miles from Interstate 495. 60 Willow Street is an excellent opportunity for a R&D, flex and/or light-manufacturing user.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE is pleased to announce the availability of 60 Willow Street, a ±55,302 SF fully air-conditioned flex facility available for lease in North Andover, Massachusetts. Over the years, the property housed Rohm & Haas and, most recently, The Dow Chemical Company. 60 Willow Street has extensive power, HVAC capacity and a flexible layout that can accommodate a variety of users.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Warehouse/Distribution/Flex Sublease at 500 Research Drive, Wilmington

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Conveniently located just 2 miles to route 3, 4.2 miles to I-95, 9.5 miles to route I-93,
and 17.9 miles to Downtown Boston.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE is pleased to present the opportunity to lease a ±28,800 suite and a ±19,100 SF suite or a combined ±47,900 SF of first-class warehouse/office space at 16 Progress Road in Billerica, MA. With 13 loading docks, up to ±7,000 SF of office space, and ±72 parking spaces, these suites can accommodate a wide variety of users.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Flex/Warehouse Space Available at 16 Progress Road

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Situated on 41.3 acres, 550 King Street is located at the inter section of Route 119 and Route 110 less than one mile from Exit 31 of f I 495. This location offers excellent accessibility further complemented by the on-site Lowell Regional Transit Authority LRTA”) bus stop which services then Charles A Gallagher Transit Terminal in Lowell.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 550 King Street includes two, interconnected three story, Class-A office buildings encompassing 490,119 square feet of Class A office space in Littleton, MA. Service is enhanced with onsite management located in the historic residential building referred to as the Tuttle House.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Two interconnected Class-A Office Buildings Available

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
115 & 117 Flanders are located at the confluence of the New England region’s principal roadways, Interstate 495, the Mass Pike (Interstate 90) and Route 9. Many premier companies are located in the submarket due to its superior access and central
location, which allow them to draw upon the highly skilled workforce for which New England is known. Corporate neighbors in Westborough include TJX Companies, Park Place Technologies, Marvell, GE Healthcare, Ameresco, Liberty Mutual, Dell EMC, Ken’s and Verizon.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: On behalf of Connecticut River Capital, CBRE is pleased to present this exciting opportunity to lease 115 & 117 Flanders Road in Westborough, Massachusetts. 115 & 117 Flanders are comprised of first class office, lab and flex space totaling 115,231 SF between two buildings. 115 Flanders offers 9,180 SF of office/flex space (and 1,875 SF of storage space). 117 Flanders offers 35,493 SF of office, lab and flex space.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Office/Lab/Flex Space Available at 117 Flanders Road

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The properties feature convenient access from several routes, including I-90, I-495 and Route 9.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 4 + 8 Technology Drive are two Class A office buildings located in an amenity-rich office park in Westborough, Massachusetts. The properties feature shared on-site amenities including a café with outdoor seating and fitness center, as well as robust available parking. Both buildings are well suited to office and R&D uses.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 4+8 Technology Drive, Westborough | Office/R&D Space Available

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Office/Flex Space Available at 115 Flanders Road

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located within Cedar Hill Business Park, 734 Forest Street is situated directly off the Interstate 495 and Simarano Drive in Marlborough, offering tenants convenient access to Route 9, Interstate 90 and Interstate 290.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Being situated between Massachusetts' major highway systems, this unique, first class, ±55,000 SF flex building provides convenient access throughout Massachusetts and New England. The available ±10,300 SF office/flex suite offers versatility with ample parking (a ±3.6/1,000 parking ratio), the ability to be delivered fully furnished, and provides access to one dedicated loading dock.
